cards.name: A Bargain
cards.description: Purchase one of the peddler's wonderful wares!

cards.name: Broken Crystal
cards.description:
When you draw this, randomize its cost and draw a card.
Reduce regeneration of ALL enemies by 5.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Clairvoyance
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards. They gain Retain until played.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Gain [E] [E] [E] .
Exhaust.

cards.name: Earth-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 10 (12) damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 4 (5) anniv6:Plated Armor.
Gain 2 (3) Thorns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fire-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Gain 1 (2) Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 1 Focus.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Foresee
cards.description:
Scry 4 (6).
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Gilded Defend
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Gilded Essence
cards.description: Gain 2 (3) anniv6:Plated Armor.

cards.name: Gilded Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Guiding Light
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Upgrade your hand.

cards.name: Hand of the Abyss
cards.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 2 (3) anniv6:Abysstouched.

cards.name: Ice-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Gain 1 (2) Artifact.
Gain 1 Buffer.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Inevitability
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Increase these amounts by 3 this combat.
Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.

cards.name: Languish
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
ALL enemies lose 4 Strength this turn and lose 4 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.description:
Deal 11 (15) damage.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Lightning Helix
cards.description:
Deal 3 (5) damage.
Heal 3 (5) HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mirari's Wake
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Gain 1 (2) Strength.
Gain 1 (2) Dexterity.
At the start of your turn (,) gain [E] .

cards.name: Mirror Move
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Exhaust.
(Becomes a random enemy's previous move)

cards.name: Mitosis
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage for ALL your Mitoses or Statuses.
When you draw this, shuffle a copy into your draw pile. Exhaust.

cards.name: Necropotence
cards.description:
Retain.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Lose 1 HP.
Return this card to your hand.

cards.name: Staggershock
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage to ALL enemies. At the start of your next turn, play this card again.

cards.name: Steel Wall
cards.description:
Gain 7 (8) Block.
Gain 1 (2) anniv6:Metallicize.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Verdict
cards.description:
Apply 12 (17) anniv6:Verdict.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Void-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 2 (3) times.
Enemy loses 2 (3) Strength.
Gain 1 Blur.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wall of Blossoms
cards.description:
Gain 2 Dexterity.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Wind-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 4 (5) damage 3 times.
Gain 4 (6) Block 2 times.
Apply 2 (3) Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Angry Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
Exhaust 1 non-Attack card at random.

cards.name: Broccoli
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Strength.
Gain 2 (3) Dexterity.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Candy Cane
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) damage.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Charge
cards.description: In 2 turns, gain 14 (18) anniv6:Vigor.

cards.name: Cookie
cards.description:
Gain 9 (12) Block.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Energy Drink
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E]  ( [E]) .
Fleeting.

cards.name: Fast Food
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Meat Mallet
cards.description:
Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply 1 Weak.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Shield
cards.description:
Gain 11 (14) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sneak Attack
cards.description: Deal 12 (15) damage.

cards.name: Throw Rock
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
Gain 2 (3) Strength.
At the end of this turn, lose 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: Assassinate
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 18 (24) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cake
cards.description:
Gain 40 (50) Block.
Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Chewing Gum
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards and gain [E] [E]  ( [E] ) .
Add Slime to the top of your draw pile.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Cure
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Remove ALL of your debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage twice.
Gain 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: Frozen Yoghurt
cards.description:
Gain 8 anniv6:Metallicize.
Gain 2 (1) Vulnerable.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Full Plate
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 6 (8) Block.

cards.name: Jaw Breaker
cards.description:
Deal 40 (50) damage.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Jelly Beans
cards.description:
Apply 3 (4) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 Weak.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Milk
cards.description:
Apply 1 Artifact.
Gain 2 (3) Artifact.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Mounted Combat
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Apply anniv6:Slow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pepper
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) Strength.
Lose 1 Dexterity.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Poison Spray
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
Apply Poison equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Poisoned Apple
cards.description:
Apply 9 (12) Poison.
Take 3 damage.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Rig
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw a card and Exhaust a card.

cards.name: Sit
cards.description: Enemy loses 6 (8) Strength this turn.

cards.name: Banana
cards.description:
Raise your Max HP by 2 (3).
Fleeting.

cards.name: Chocolate Bar
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) Regen.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Cocktail
cards.description:
Obtain a random drinkable potion.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Critical Hit
cards.description:
Your next attack deals double (triple) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flurry
cards.description: Deal 8 (11) damage to a random enemy X+1 times.

cards.name: Gold Candy
cards.description:
Gain 30 (40) Gold.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Inspire
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
At the start of your turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Omega Curse
cards.description:
Enemy takes 5 (7) more damage from Attacks.
Lose 10 HP.

cards.name: RRrroohrrRGHHhhh!!
cards.description: Whenever an enemy doesn't attack during its turn, gain 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: The Horde
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, add a random Gremlin card into your hand.

relics.name: Bow Tie
relics.description: Shop cards are Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: It makes you look twice as professional.

relics.name: Broken Damaru
relics.description: At the end of your turn, you may Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain Mantra equal to its cost.

relics.name: Broken Data Disk
relics.description: At the start of each combat, lose 1 Focus. The first time you Channel an Orb each turn, Channel another Orb of the same type.

relics.name: Broken Matryoshka
relics.description: Add 4 Relics to the rewards, but the next 2 chests you open are empty. If you don't have the Sapphire Key, it will be linked to a Relic.

relics.name: Broken Maw Bank
relics.description: Gain 400 Gold next time you enter a shop, but lose 400 Gold when you leave.

relics.name: Broken Omamori
relics.description: Add 2 Curses to your deck. Whenever you rest, Upgrade 2 random cards in your deck.

relics.name: Broken Prayer Wheel
relics.description: Card rewards contain 1 less card, but each Gold reward is multiplied by 2.

relics.name: Broken Red Skull
relics.description: When you are above 50% HP, you have 3 extra Dexterity.

relics.name: Broken Singing Bowl
relics.description: Whenever you gain Max HP, Upgrade 1 random card in your deck.

relics.name: Broken Snecko Eye
relics.description: At the start of each turn, add 1 copy of a random card from your deck into your hand. It Purges, is Ethereal, and is unreadable.

relics.name: Broken Snecko Skull
relics.description: When you gain a buff, gain 1 more.

relics.name: Broken Sozu
relics.description: In-combat potions cost [E] to use. When you spend energy on a potion, use another random potion.

relics.name: Broken Wing Boots
relics.description: When you would enter an event in a ? room, choose between two events.

relics.name: Contraption
relics.description: The next time you would die in combat, heal to 1 HP and flee combat if possible.

relics.name: Duelity
relics.description: Whenever you play a Skill, gain 1 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: Apparently Gremlin Nobs are bad at spelling.

relics.name: Frostcoal
relics.description: Enemies deal 6 less damage during the first turn of combat.

relics.name: Gremlin Claw
relics.description: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Gremlins can be very dangerous even without a weapon.

relics.name: Gremlin Hood
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Gremlin cards and add the chosen card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: The orange mask bandits never really caught on.

relics.name: Gremlin Staff
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 15 Vigor.
relics.flavorText: Your hand tingles when you hold it.

relics.name: Lock Picks
relics.description: Gain 30 Gold upon entering a rest site.

relics.name: Louse Plushie
relics.description: The first time you take unblocked Attack damage each combat, gain 15 Block next turn.

relics.name: Nob Club
relics.description: Every time you play 5 Attacks, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.

relics.name: Old Hat
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 3 Vigor.

relics.name: Spruce Charm
relics.description: The first Attack you play during the first turn of combat is played twice.
relics.flavorText: From the pommel of her sword.

relics.name: Standing Stone Fragment
relics.description: Starts with 13 charges. At the start of your turn, gain [E] and this loses a charge.
relics.flavorText: The fragment exudes a powerful aura, but it seems just out of reach.

relics.name: War Horn
relics.description: Start each Boss combat with 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: When you blow on this horn, you feel like you could take on anything.

potions.name: Grem's Fire
potions.description: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn.

potions.name: Mushroom Soup
potions.description: Gain 3 Temporary HP at the end of your turn.

potions.name: Noxious Brew
potions.description: Apply 3 Poison to a random enemy at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Broken
keywords.description: Relics corrupted by the Broken Space. They are forms of original relics, but they are twisted and have different effects.

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, the enemy receives 10% more damage from Attacks that turn.

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Your next Attack deals more damage

keywords.name: Abysstouched
keywords.description: Increases attack damage taken and deals damage every turn.

keywords.name: Abysstouched Pulse
keywords.description: Applies Abysstouched to you each turn.

keywords.name: Beat of Death
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, take damage.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Blight[]
keywords.description: A negative modifier.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Blighted[]
keywords.description: Modified with a negative effect.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Brittle[]
keywords.description: Lose 1 Dexterity.

keywords.name: Buffer
keywords.description: Prevent the next HP loss.

keywords.name: Burning
keywords.description: Burning creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Crippling[]
keywords.description: Apply 1 Weak to the target enemy, or a random enemy if not a single target.

keywords.name: Damp
keywords.description: Damp cards Retain and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Dazed Pulse
keywords.description: Shuffles a Dazed into your draw pile each turn.

keywords.name: Electric
keywords.description: When played, gain [E] and remove Electric.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Enchant[]
keywords.description: Modify with a positive effect.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Enchantment[]
keywords.description: A positive modifier.

keywords.name: Enraged
keywords.description: Whenever you play a skill, gains Strength.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Exposing[]
keywords.description: Apply 1 Vulnerable to the target enemy, or a random enemy if not a single target.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Feeble[]
keywords.description: Gain 1 Frail.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Flawed[]
keywords.description: Gain 1 Weak.

keywords.name: Flighty
keywords.description: When drawn, draw 1 card and remove Flighty.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Fragile[]
keywords.description: Gain 1 Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Frail Pulse
keywords.description: Applies Frail to you each turn.

keywords.name: Frostbite
keywords.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, take 4 damage.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Harmful[]
keywords.description: Take 5 damage.

keywords.name: Invincible
keywords.description: Caps how much HP can be lost each turn.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: Gains Block at the end of its turn.

keywords.name: Plated Armor
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of you turn. Reduced by receiving unblocked attack damage.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Powerful[]
keywords.description: Gain 1 Strength.

keywords.name: [#ff8cd5]Powerless[]
keywords.description: Lose 1 Strength.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Protective[]
keywords.description: Gain 1 Dexterity.

keywords.name: Reflective
keywords.description: Increases the damage and Block amount of Mirror Move.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Sharp[]
keywords.description: Deal 5 damage to the target enemy, or a random enemy if not a single target.

keywords.name: Shattered
keywords.description: After you play a Mirror Move, Shattered creatures lose 10% of their current HP per stack, rounded up.

keywords.name: Slimy Body
keywords.description: Shuffles a Slimed into your draw pile whenever you deal unblocked attack damage.

keywords.name: [#8c9cff]Tough[]
keywords.description: Gain 4 Block.

keywords.name: Verdict
keywords.description: A creature with Verdict dies at the start of its turn if its current HP is less than its Verdict. Otherwise, it gains 3 Verdict.
